book.title: Sphinx's Princess (Sphinx's Princess, #1)
book.publisher: Random House Books for Young Readers

review.body: wow.
it was interesting
read for children's literature class

"كن طفلاً
كما ينبغي...
فالحياة أشبه بعجلةِ
دراجتك الأمامية،
الحياة
التي
ككرة ثلجٍ..
تنتظر ـ بشغفٍ ـ لحظة زوالها"
Couldn't put it down!

Okay

This was an okay story; although not my favorite. I enjoyed the creatures, though. I felt they were very original. The story itself was quite original, as well, though I felt it lacked the proper pizzazz needed to make it great. All in all, a decent effort.

Return to Me is such a sweet but great read. The type of book that makes you wish to be part of this fairy-tale story. The type that most women wish to be swept off their feet by a charming and beautiful man in real life.

When is meant to be, love will always conquer. No matter what the circumstan...

A STRANGE AND GRUESOME STORY

There is little merit to this tale. It is inconclusive and not worth spending time on. It has no redeeming qualities. I do not recommend it.

book.title: Relish: My Life in the Kitchen

review.body: Fun book, love the drawings and reading about food is always nice!

book.title: Lovelorn: Episode Six (The Demon Gate Series Book 6)

review.body:
I loved it.

Didn't realize I had already read this book until I started it. It was part of an anthology. I can't wait for chance to come out. I love this series
Very good
It was a good start, but a bit choppy as everyone was introduced. I'll keep reading in trade, as the art is excellent.

book.title: The Total Money Makeover: A Proven Plan for Financial Fitness

review.body: Amazing. Will transform your view on money. I've read rich dad, poor dad and this is actually practical. You can put this book down and put it into action immediately.

Honeymoon for Three

Chris Keniston

All Pam Watson knew was she needed to get on that cruise and everything would settle down, she would marry her fiancé ‘Leo. then live Happily Ever After! Right? What could be farther from the truth!!!!!!

Chris Keniston has done it again, Book# 2 of the Honeymoon s...

book.title: The DUFF: Designated Ugly Fat Friend

review.body: Meh, it was okay.

After finishing Pushkin, and while waiting for Lermontov, I picked this one up.
It was great. Quick, taut, intriguing stories in a cold climate where the light of day is
sporadic.
Uma historia para crianças que muitos adultos deveriam ler
More of the same. Good and fun enough to keep reading.

I had just a bit of a hard time getting into the story line of this book. It starts out with the death of Karlinah's husband. You know that she has a secret about what has happened to him, but it takes quite a while in the book to actually learn what happened to him.

Karlinah doesn't want to stay...

This story is an interesting twist on two people renewing their love affair after many years of separation. Most of the book is the back story – how Jen and Phil spent their lives after breaking up when they were young – and when they meet after 20 years and the ending of other relationships, the...
